#### About
Dana Kahn is a budding environmental scientist and musical advocate. She is currently a second-year Master's of Science student and researcher at Emory University in Atlanta, GA. Dana conducts environmental research on methane cycle processes in Northern Forests in the [Sihi Biogeochemistry Laboratory](https://www.debjanisihi.com/).
